query:
ALTER TABLE chat_messages 
ADD COLUMN audioTranscription TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewTitle VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewDescription TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewImage TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewUrl TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN isEdited BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN editedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN originalMessage TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN deletedForSender BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN deletedForAll BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN deletedAt TIMESTAMP NULL;

ADD COLUMN audioTranscription TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewTitle VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewDescription TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewImage TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewUrl TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN isEdited BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN editedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN originalMessage TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN deletedForSender BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN deletedForAll BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN deletedAt TIMESTAMP NULL;
